Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
G-string \G-string\ n. 1. a patch of cloth attached to and supported by string-like cords, worn over the hips, and serving to cover only the pubic area; -- often worn by stripteasers.
Syn: thong, merkin. [WordNet 1.5]
2. A small covering for the loins.
Syn: breechcloth, breechclout, loincloth. [WordNet 1.5]
3. [from Dr. Graubau.] (Physics) A transmission line consisting a single wire coated with dielectric, thus permitting surface-wave propagation. [slang] --Dict. Sci. Technol. [PJC]
G-string n 1: minimal clothing worn by stripteasers; covering for the pubic area 2: a garment that provides covering for the loins [syn: {breechcloth}, {breechclout}, {loincloth}]
